# Section 2

```{r readdata, include=FALSE}
Criminal_Sec2 <- read.csv("~/5513Tutorial9/Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")

```

```{r tableA, include=FALSE}
Criminal_Sec2_against_person <- Criminal_Sec2 %>%
  filter(Offence.Division == "A Crimes against the person")

Criminal_Sec2_against_person %>%
  head(10) %>%
   kable(booktabs = TRUE, caption = "Criminal Incidents against person in December 2019")
```

```{r figureA, include=FALSE}
ggplot(Criminal_Sec2_against_person,
       aes(x= Offence.Subdivision, 
           y = Incidents.Recorded, group = Offence.Subdivision, color = Offence.Subdivision)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ Offence.Subdivision, ncol = 2)
```
